column2: Love Peaches and Cream Day Spa!
column3: LOVE LOVE LOVE Peaches and Cream Day Spa!! Been coming here for years and it never disappoints!! Such a relaxing atmosphere once you walk thru the doors! And Valerie is fabulous for a great massage!

I'll admit I usually purchase cheap massages that are okay but my boyfriend gifted me this massage for Christmas and it was amazing. My masseuse was wonderful and she put me totally at ease and the entire time I was relaxed and enjoying it. I like massages that I can feel. If they're too soft it feels like nothing to me so she was the perfect balance.

Always enjoy treating myself to a facial at Peaches and Cream. Lovely soothing ambiance and the staff is friendly and professional. Haven't tried other services but my daughter loves the Relaxation Massage. Highly recommend.
I love the atmosphere, the great products and the steam shower is the best at the end of a great massage. The massage therapists are all so knowledgeable and friendly
The staff at Peaches and Cream Day Spa are wonderful and the services truly make you feel pampered. Stop by and enjoy the great variety of services offered at the Spa.

This is the ONLY professional spa in the east San Gabriel Valley. Professionally operated, super clean, quiet, peaceful. Please don't subject yourself to a strip mall spa! This is what you want (p.s. Husbands: this is where your wife wants a gift card from. Trust me on this!)

This is a very nice day spa - I've had several services provided here, including facials, and a variety of massages, and also reflexology. The staff are very professional and seem very well-qualified. Not too much pressure to upgrade, although they definitely let you know what options are available. Environment is very relaxing, very pleasant. I have never had to wait more than a few minutes for my appointments, which I really appreciate.

These estheticians know what they are doing. Many have been in this line of work for years. They not only TRUELY evaluate your skin, but educate you on how to take care of any condition you may have. The spa is immaculate. You can not find better. TRUELY theist in the San Gabriel Valley.
I went for waxing and a massage. It was very relaxing an comfortable. The environment is quiet and calm and the employees make yoiu feel very welcome.
I have been using Peaches and Cream Day Spa for over 15 years and the staff is very professional and helpful.

I love Peaches & Cream Day Spa. I've been coming here for facials, massages, full body exfoliation, professional makeup application & skincare products for over 15 years. I used to love in Glendora but now I drive in from Orange County. The staff, aestheticians & massage therapists are all very professional and go out of their way to make you feel welcome & ensure you relaxed and leave feeling renewed. Pricing on services & products are fair.I recommend Peaches & Cream all the time to family & friends.

I v been coming here for years!Great Gorgeous spa! Love the Owner Beryl, and her staff. Carol will welcome you with her warm smile and the staff will make you feel right at home! Their is shower and or a place to sit back and relaxes shaded areas, listening to the water fountain. Many different facial products for ALL Skin Types and the ladies are very knowledgable!!!Jeanette S.Make up station too.Have a cup of tea or fresh water Complementary.
